title: Lovers and Liars
description: Roman Peters... ʌoɹʇǝԀBrother... ɹɐı˥Soldier... ɟǝıɥ⊥A new Santiago Series novel coming soon.“I’m just a hop, skip and a lie away from discovering your secrets, detective...”“Oh?” Dissolute, green eyes flicker across my face as he measures out an answer to my threat. He takes his time, casting shade over my conviction with each passing second. “Black arrows can’t touch me, Miss—whatever you call yourself these days. They don’t even leave a mark.”“Maybe not.” I lean in close, so close, until his chilly perfection starts stealing all my oxygen. “But bleeding ones can…”
author: Catherine Wiltcher
